name: llm-api-lb
description: Local LLM API load balancer with round-robin and a small management UI

scripts.build:bin:mac: cross-env PKG_CACHE_PATH=.pkg-cache pkg -t node18-macos-x64,node18-macos-arm64 -o dist/llm-api-lb-macos server.js
scripts.build:bin:linux: cross-env PKG_CACHE_PATH=.pkg-cache pkg -t node18-linux-x64 -o dist/llm-api-lb-linux-x64 server.js
scripts.build:bin:win: cross-env PKG_CACHE_PATH=.pkg-cache pkg -t node18-win-x64 -o dist/llm-api-lb-windows-x64.exe server.js
